2017-08-03.desc: The official music video for Otoboke Beaver's song "Ikezu."

2017-08-04.desc: Bundled with the limited edition of manga's 13th volume.

2017-08-04.name: Haikyuu!! Tokushuu! Haru-kou Volley ni Kaketa Seishun
2017-08-04.desc:
This is a dynamic dream battle featuring many types of Gunpla skirmishing in all sorts of situations.

Source: gundam.info

2017-08-05.name: Heibai Wushang Di Er Ji
2017-08-05.desc:
Pig lives at the top of a hill in a town surrounded by a destructive, dark cloud. Before Pig's father leaves to find a solution to the cloud, he builds Pig a small wooden dam to protect him and the town. The dam's windmill keeps the cloud at bay, and Pig now has the responsibility to care for the dam. Young and alone, Pig finds love and family through his friendship with Fox, and continues to care for the townsfolk in a variety of ways. However, Pig struggles with the absence of his father, and his desire to search for his father competes with his need to keep the town safe.

Source: Official page

Note: It was screened at the Short Shorts Film Festival event in Tokyo in June 2017.

2017-08-09.name: Uma no Friends
2017-08-09.desc: An anime collaboration between Kemono Friends and the Japan Racing Association.

2017-08-11.name: Xing You Ji: Fengbao Fa Mi La
2017-08-11.desc: An anime collaboration between Kemono Friends and the Japan Racing Association.

2017-08-12.name: Shirotan: Shirotan ga Ippai!
2017-08-12.desc:
During October of his third year in high school, Koyomi Araragi is introduced to a transfer student named Ougi Oshino by his underclassman Kanbaru Suruga. Ougi tells Koyomi that she has something she wishes to consult with him. When she draws the map of Naoestu High School, she finds something peculiar on the map of Naoetsu High School she draws. This discovery reveals a tale that wasn't meant to be told, and this makes Koyomi's high school life totally different. This is the story that brings to light "what" makes Koyomi Araragi. This is the story that reveals the "beginning" of everything.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-08-18.name: Shi Wan Ge Leng Xiaohua 2
2017-08-18.desc:
During October of his third year in high school, Koyomi Araragi is introduced to a transfer student named Ougi Oshino by his underclassman Kanbaru Suruga. Ougi tells Koyomi that she has something she wishes to consult with him. When she draws the map of Naoestu High School, she finds something peculiar on the map of Naoetsu High School she draws. This discovery reveals a tale that wasn't meant to be told, and this makes Koyomi's high school life totally different. This is the story that brings to light "what" makes Koyomi Araragi. This is the story that reveals the "beginning" of everything.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-08-18.name: Xue Se Cang Qiong
2017-08-18.desc: The ordinary life of the office worker Li Ming Yang changes when he is caught in a killing city by a weird QR code. There everyone is forced to participate in a survival game where is only one rule "kill or be killed." In the process of finding a way out of the city Li Ming Yang slowly finds the truth about the mastermind behind the whole incident.

2017-08-23.name: Dre-Fes! R
2017-08-23.desc:
The Dream Festival is the stage that all idols dream of singing on, with their professional debut on the line. In order to get there, idols work their hardest every day to perfect their performance... and the key to coming out on top is the Dream Festival Cards sent by fans to their favorite idols. Receiving these Cards makes the idols who make it to the stage shine even brighter. Now head to the Dream Festival with your Dream Festival Card in hand for the idol you love most!

Source: crunchyroll

2017-08-24.name: Boku wa Sonzai Shiteinakatta
2017-08-24.desc: Music video for the debut single of the "dimension-crossing" idol group 22/7.

2017-08-25.name: Fuusen Inu Tinny: Nandaka Fushigi na - Kyouryuu no Kuni
2017-08-25.desc: Note: Screened as a double feature with Eiga Kuma no Gakkou: Patissier Jackie to Ohisama no Sweets.

2017-08-25.name: Kemono Friends x Anisama 2017 "Anisama"
2017-08-25.desc:
Northern White-faced Owl and Eurasian Eagle Owl are gathering a team of friends together to clean up the dilapidated Saitama Super Arena, the real-life venue of the Animelo Summer Live event. While there, the friends find cards that teach proper behavior while enjoying the concert, such as not using electronic devices. ("What's a 'mobile'?" "Doesn't look very tasty.") Later, the friends see how many people are entering the venue (far above their estimate of 100), and beat a hasty retreat.

Source: ANN

Note: A collaboration video of TV anime Kemono Friends and the animation song festival "Animelo Summer Live 2017 - THE CARD -" that was screened before the opening of each day at the festival (Aug. 25-27).

2017-08-25.name: Onagawa Chuu Baske Bu: 5-nin no Natsu
2017-08-25.desc:
Nagisa is a girl who is a little impatient because she cannot find her future calling. She wanders into an abandoned mini FM radio station. On impulse, she tries to become a DJ, and her broadcast words by chance unexpectedly reaches people.

Source: ANN
